title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the File Menu Most Recently Used (MRU) list do not appear when the application is restarted.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions and should still appear when the application is restarted.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open some files.
3. Close the application.
4. Launch the application again.

Expected result: The MRU list in the File menu should display the previously opened files.
